data.meanings: great, important, big, regard, honour, mighty, glorious, a man of moment, All-mighty, All-glorious, grievous, bounty/abounding, magnify/increase. azzama - to make great
data.sentence: The word الْعَظِيمُ comes from the root ع ظ م and is associated with the meanings: great, important, big, regard, honour, mighty, glorious, a man of moment, All-mighty, All-glorious, grievous, bounty/abounding, magnify/increase. azzama - to make great
The word لَهُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: to succeed, gain victory, achieve a goal, triumph, get possession, obtain one's desires, escape, salvation, safety, acquire, gain. mafazatun - time/place of safety/refuge/felicity/serenity, of escape.
data.sentence: The word الْفَوْزُ comes from the root ف و ز and is associated with the meanings: to succeed, gain victory, achieve a goal, triumph, get possession, obtain one's desires, escape, salvation, safety, acquire, gain. mafazatun - time/place of safety/refuge/felicity/serenity, of escape.
